panels.description: Daily new user registrations and cumulative user count based on actual user creation dates from the Cloudflare D1 database. Shows real signup data, not first usage.
panels.title: User Growth (Real Signups)

panels.description: Daily new user registrations and cumulative user count. Tracks when users first appear in the system based on their earliest event.

targets.rawSql:
WITH first_seen AS (
  SELECT 
    user_github_username,
    toDateTime(min(start_time)) as first_day
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE 
    user_github_username != 'undefined'
    AND user_github_username != ''
  GROUP BY user_github_username
),
time_range AS (
  SELECT 
    min(start_time) as range_start
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
),
pre_period_count AS (
  SELECT count() as pre_users
  FROM first_seen, time_range
  WHERE toDate(first_day) < toDate(range_start)
),
filtered_users AS (
  SELECT 
    first_day,
    user_github_username
  FROM first_seen
  WHERE $__timeFilter(first_day)
),
daily_new AS (
  SELECT 
    date_trunc('$granularity', first_day) as time_bucket,
    count() as new_users
  FROM filtered_users
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
)
SELECT 
  time_bucket as time,
  new_users as "New Users",
  (SELECT pre_users FROM pre_period_count) + sum(new_users) OVER (ORDER BY time_bucket ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as "Cumulative Users"
FROM daily_new
ORDER BY time_bucket

panels.title: Usage Growth

panels.description: Count of users grouped by their tier category

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT tier, COUNT(*) as user_count FROM user GROUP BY tier ORDER BY user_count DESC"}

panels.title: Total Users by Tier

panels.description: Shows the average percentage of daily free credits consumed per user over time, grouped by tier. Uses the same calculation as the bar gauge: total consumed divided by (days × daily limit). Only supports day granularity.

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
  deduplicated_events AS (
    SELECT 
      date_trunc('day', start_time) AS ts,
      user_github_username,
      user_tier,
      request_id,
      total_price,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND is_billed_usage = true
      AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  user_daily_consumption AS (
    SELECT 
      ts,
      user_github_username,
      user_tier,
      SUM(total_price) as daily_consumed
    FROM deduplicated_events
    WHERE rn = 1
    GROUP BY ts, user_github_username, user_tier
  ),
  tier_limits AS (
    SELECT 'spore' AS tier, 1 AS daily_limit
    UNION ALL SELECT 'seed', 10
    UNION ALL SELECT 'flower', 15
    UNION ALL SELECT 'nectar', 20
  ),
  user_daily_percentages AS (
    SELECT 
      uc.ts,
      uc.user_tier,
      (uc.daily_consumed / tl.daily_limit) * 100 as daily_usage_percentage
    FROM user_daily_consumption uc
    INNER JOIN tier_limits tl ON uc.user_tier = tl.tier
    WHERE uc.daily_consumed > 0
  )
SELECT 
  user_daily_percentages.ts AS ts,
  CASE user_daily_percentages.user_tier
    WHEN 'spore' THEN 'Spore (1/day)'
    WHEN 'seed' THEN 'Seed (10/day)'
    WHEN 'flower' THEN 'Flower (15/day)'
    WHEN 'nectar' THEN 'Nectar (20/day)'
  END as tier,
  AVG(user_daily_percentages.daily_usage_percentage) as avg_daily_usage_percentage
FROM user_daily_percentages
GROUP BY user_daily_percentages.ts, user_daily_percentages.user_tier
ORDER BY user_daily_percentages.ts ASC, user_daily_percentages.user_tier ASC

panels.title: Average Free Credit Usage by Tier Over Time

panels.description: Shows the average percentage of daily free credits consumed per user, grouped by tier. Only includes v1:meter:tier usage (excludes pack-based metering). Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate calculations. Formula: (total_price per user / (days × tier_limit)) × 100, then averaged across all users in each tier.

targets.rawSql:
WITH 
  time_params AS (
    SELECT 
      GREATEST(1, 
        dateDiff('day', 
          toDate(min(start_time)), 
          toDate(max(start_time))
        ) + 1
      ) as days
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  deduplicated_events AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      request_id,
      total_price,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND user_tier = 'spore'
      AND is_billed_usage = true
      AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  user_consumption AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      SUM(total_price) as total_consumed
    FROM deduplicated_events
    WHERE rn = 1
    GROUP BY user_github_username
  )
SELECT 
  AVG((total_consumed / (days * 1)) * 100) as Spore
FROM user_consumption, time_params
WHERE total_consumed > 0

WITH 
  time_params AS (
    SELECT 
      GREATEST(1, 
        dateDiff('day', 
          toDate(min(start_time)), 
          toDate(max(start_time))
        ) + 1
      ) as days
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  deduplicated_events AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      request_id,
      total_price,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND user_tier = 'seed'
      AND is_billed_usage = true
      AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  user_consumption AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      SUM(total_price) as total_consumed
    FROM deduplicated_events
    WHERE rn = 1
    GROUP BY user_github_username
  )
SELECT 
  AVG((total_consumed / (days * 3)) * 100) as Seed
FROM user_consumption, time_params
WHERE total_consumed > 0

WITH 
  time_params AS (
    SELECT 
      GREATEST(1, 
        dateDiff('day', 
          toDate(min(start_time)), 
          toDate(max(start_time))
        ) + 1
      ) as days
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  deduplicated_events AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      request_id,
      total_price,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND user_tier = 'flower'
      AND is_billed_usage = true
      AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  user_consumption AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      SUM(total_price) as total_consumed
    FROM deduplicated_events
    WHERE rn = 1
    GROUP BY user_github_username
  )
SELECT 
  AVG((total_consumed / (days * 10)) * 100) as Flower
FROM user_consumption, time_params
WHERE total_consumed > 0

WITH 
  time_params AS (
    SELECT 
      GREATEST(1, 
        dateDiff('day', 
          toDate(min(start_time)), 
          toDate(max(start_time))
        ) + 1
      ) as days
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  deduplicated_events AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      request_id,
      total_price,
      ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE 
      $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND user_tier = 'nectar'
      AND is_billed_usage = true
      AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
      AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
  ),
  user_consumption AS (
    SELECT 
      user_github_username,
      SUM(total_price) as total_consumed
    FROM deduplicated_events
    WHERE rn = 1
    GROUP BY user_github_username
  )
SELECT 
  AVG((total_consumed / (days * 20)) * 100) as Nectar
FROM user_consumption, time_params
WHERE total_consumed > 0

panels.title: Average Free Credit Usage by Tier

url_options.data: {"sql":"SELECT name, email, tier, datetime(created_at, 'unixepoch') AS creation_datetime FROM user ORDER BY created_at DESC"}

panels.title: User Creation Dates (Debug)

panels.description: Percentage of error requests (excluding 403) as a proportion of total requests (errors + successes), grouped by event type. Shows what percentage of all requests result in errors.

targets.rawSql:
WITH error_counts AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    event_type,
    count() AS error_requests
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND (response_status < 200 OR response_status >= 300)
    AND response_status != 403
    AND event_type IN ('generate.text', 'generate.image')
  GROUP BY ts, event_type
),
success_counts AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    event_type,
    count() AS success_requests
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND event_type IN ('generate.text', 'generate.image')
  GROUP BY ts, event_type
)
SELECT
  COALESCE(e.ts, s.ts) AS ts,
  COALESCE(e.event_type, s.event_type) AS event_type,
  (COALESCE(e.error_requests, 0) * 100.0 / (COALESCE(e.error_requests, 0) + COALESCE(s.success_requests, 1))) AS error_percentage
FROM error_counts e
FULL OUTER JOIN success_counts s ON e.ts = s.ts AND e.event_type = s.event_type
WHERE (COALESCE(e.error_requests, 0) + COALESCE(s.success_requests, 0)) > 0
ORDER BY ts ASC, event_type;

panels.title: Error Rate by Event Type

panels.description: Distribution of responses by category for text models: 2xx (success), 4xx (client errors), 5xx (server errors) as percentages. 403 responses are excluded from calculations.

targets.rawSql:
WITH total_requests AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    count() AS total
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status != 403
    AND event_type = 'generate.text'
  GROUP BY ts
),
status_counts AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    CASE
      WHEN response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300 THEN '2xx Success'
      WHEN response_status >= 400 AND response_status < 500 THEN '4xx Client Errors'
      WHEN response_status >= 500 AND response_status < 600 THEN '5xx Server Errors'
      ELSE 'Other'
    END AS status_category,
    count() AS status_count
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status != 403
    AND event_type = 'generate.text'
  GROUP BY ts, status_category
)
SELECT
  s.ts,
  s.status_category,
  (s.status_count * 100.0 / t.total) AS percentage
FROM status_counts s
INNER JOIN total_requests t ON s.ts = t.ts
WHERE s.status_category != 'Other'
ORDER BY s.ts ASC, s.status_category ASC;

panels.title: Response Status Distribution - Text Models (403 ignored)

panels.description: Distribution of responses by category for image models: 2xx (success), 4xx (client errors), 5xx (server errors) as percentages. 403 responses are excluded from calculations.

targets.rawSql:
WITH total_requests AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    count() AS total
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status != 403
    AND event_type = 'generate.image'
  GROUP BY ts
),
status_counts AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    CASE
      WHEN response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300 THEN '2xx Success'
      WHEN response_status >= 400 AND response_status < 500 THEN '4xx Client Errors'
      WHEN response_status >= 500 AND response_status < 600 THEN '5xx Server Errors'
      ELSE 'Other'
    END AS status_category,
    count() AS status_count
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status != 403
    AND event_type = 'generate.image'
  GROUP BY ts, status_category
)
SELECT
  s.ts,
  s.status_category,
  (s.status_count * 100.0 / t.total) AS percentage
FROM status_counts s
INNER JOIN total_requests t ON s.ts = t.ts
WHERE s.status_category != 'Other'
ORDER BY s.ts ASC, s.status_category ASC;

panels.title: Response Status Distribution - Image Models (403 ignored)

panels.description: Count of unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by provider and model. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  concat(model_provider_used, ' - ', model_used) AS provider_model,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS requests
FROM generation_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
GROUP BY
  ts, model_provider_used, model_used
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, model_provider_used, model_used;

panels.title: Requests per Provider per Model

panels.description: Count of unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by model and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  resolved_model_requested AS model,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS requests
FROM generation_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
GROUP BY
  ts, model
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, model;

panels.title: Requests per Model

panels.description: Count of successful generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by user and time granularity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  user_github_username AS user,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS requests
FROM generation_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300

panels.title: Requests per User

panels.description: Count of successful generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by API key ID and time granularity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  api_key_name AS api_key,
  count(DISTINCT request_id) AS requests
FROM generation_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
GROUP BY
  ts, api_key
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, api_key;

panels.title: Requests per API Key ID

panels.description: Shows API key requests (blue), referrer URL requests (orange), and the percentage of API key requests that ALSO have pollinations.ai referrer (green, right Y-axis)

matcher.options: Percentage: Referrer in API Key Requests

targets.rawSql:
SELECT ts, series, requests
FROM (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    'API Key: pollinations.ai-ui.assets' AS series,
    toFloat64(count(DISTINCT request_id)) AS requests
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND api_key_name = 'pollinations.ai-ui.assets'
  GROUP BY ts

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    'Referrer: pollinations.ai' AS series,
    toFloat64(count(DISTINCT request_id)) AS requests
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND referrer_url LIKE '%pollinations.ai%'
  GROUP BY ts

  UNION ALL

  SELECT
    ts,
    'Percentage: Referrer in API Key Requests' AS series,
    CASE 
      WHEN api_key_requests > 0 THEN (both_conditions * 100.0 / api_key_requests)
      ELSE 0.0
    END AS requests
  FROM (
    SELECT
      date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
      toFloat64(countDistinctIf(request_id, api_key_name = 'pollinations.ai-ui.assets' AND referrer_url LIKE '%pollinations.ai%')) AS both_conditions,
      toFloat64(countDistinctIf(request_id, api_key_name = 'pollinations.ai-ui.assets')) AS api_key_requests
    FROM generation_event
    WHERE
      $__timeFilter(start_time)
      AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    GROUP BY ts
  )
) AS combined
ORDER BY ts ASC, series ASC

panels.title: Request Comparison: API Key vs Referrer URL

panels.description: Count of successful generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by user and time granularity

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ts,
  avg(requests) AS avg_requests_per_user
FROM (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('${granularity}', start_time) AS ts,
    user_github_username AS user,
    countDistinct(request_id) AS requests
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
  GROUP BY
    ts, user
)
GROUP BY
  ts
ORDER BY
  ts ASC;

panels.title: Avg Requests per User

panels.description: Percentage of cache hits over time for generate-text and generate-image events

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
  event_type,
  (countIf(cache_hit = true) * 100.0 / count()) AS cache_hit_percentage
FROM generation_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND event_type IN ('generate.text', 'generate.image')
GROUP BY
  ts, event_type
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, event_type;

FROM generation_event
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND event_type IN ('generate.image', 'generate.text')
GROUP BY
  ts, event_type
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, event_type;

panels.description: Count of unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by model and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure one request = one request_id.

  date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,

panels.title: Requests per Provider

panels.description: Shows pack spending (revenue) vs total costs (pack + tier) and the balance deficit over time

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT 
    date_trunc('hour', start_time) AS ts,
    selected_meter_slug,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
),
aggregated_costs AS (
  SELECT 
    ts,
    SUM(CASE WHEN selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:pack' THEN total_cost ELSE 0 END) as pack_spending,
    SUM(total_cost) as total_costs
  FROM deduplicated_events
  WHERE rn = 1
  GROUP BY ts
)
SELECT 
  ts,
  pack_spending as "Revenue (Pack Spending)",
  -total_costs as "Costs (Negative)",
  (pack_spending - total_costs) as "Balance"
FROM aggregated_costs
ORDER BY ts ASC

panels.title: Cost/Revenue Balance Over Time

panels.description: Sum of total costs for unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by model and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate cost aggregation - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    model_used AS model,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT
  ts,
  model,
  sum(total_cost) AS total_cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY
  ts, model
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, model;

panels.title: Costs per Model

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    user_github_username AS user,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT

panels.title: Total Costs per Github Username

panels.description: Sum of total costs for unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by API key and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate cost aggregation - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    api_key_name AS api_key,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT
  ts,

  sum(total_cost) AS total_cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY
  ts, api_key

  ts ASC, api_key;

panels.title: Costs per API Key ID

panels.description: Evolution of cost per cumulative user over time. Shows how much each user costs on average as the user base grows.

targets.rawSql:
WITH first_seen AS (
  SELECT 
    user_github_username,
    toDateTime(min(start_time)) as first_day
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE 
    user_github_username != 'undefined'
    AND user_github_username != ''
  GROUP BY user_github_username
),
time_range AS (
  SELECT 
    min(start_time) as range_start
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE $__timeFilter(start_time)
),
pre_period_count AS (
  SELECT count() as pre_users
  FROM first_seen, time_range
  WHERE toDate(first_day) < toDate(range_start)
),
filtered_users AS (
  SELECT 
    first_day,
    user_github_username
  FROM first_seen
  WHERE $__timeFilter(first_day)
),
daily_new AS (
  SELECT 
    date_trunc('$granularity', first_day) as time_bucket,
    count() as new_users
  FROM filtered_users
  GROUP BY time_bucket
  ORDER BY time_bucket
),
cumulative_users AS (
  SELECT 
    time_bucket,
    (SELECT pre_users FROM pre_period_count) + sum(new_users) OVER (ORDER BY time_bucket ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as total_users
  FROM daily_new
),
deduplicated_costs AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
),
aggregated_costs AS (
  SELECT
    ts,
    sum(total_cost) as total_cost
  FROM deduplicated_costs
  WHERE rn = 1
  GROUP BY ts
)
SELECT 
  c.ts as time,
  CASE 
    WHEN u.total_users > 0 THEN c.total_cost / u.total_users
    ELSE 0
  END as "Cost per User"
FROM aggregated_costs c
LEFT JOIN cumulative_users u ON c.ts = u.time_bucket
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cost per User

panels.description: Evolution of cost per successful request over time. Shows the average cost efficiency of each request.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT
  ts as time,
  CASE 
    WHEN count(*) > 0 THEN sum(total_cost) / count(*)
    ELSE 0
  END as "Cost per Request"
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY ts
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Cost per Request

panels.description: Sum of total costs for user pollen-router grouped by api_key_name and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate cost aggregation - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    api_key_name AS api_key,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND user_github_username = 'pollen-router'
)
SELECT
  ts,
  api_key,
  sum(total_cost) AS total_cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY
  ts, api_key
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, api_key;

panels.title: Total Costs for pollen-router by API Key

panels.description: Calculates the actual daily cost of providing free credits to users based on real usage. Shows breakdown by tier (Spore, Seed, Flower, Nectar).

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT 
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    user_tier,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
    AND user_github_username != ''
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier'
    AND response_status >= 200 
    AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT 
  ts,
  user_tier as tier,
  SUM(total_cost) as cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
  AND user_tier IN ('spore', 'seed', 'flower', 'nectar')
GROUP BY ts, tier
ORDER BY ts ASC, tier ASC

panels.title: Daily Sponsorship Cost by Tier

panels.description: Daily costs comparison between tier-based free credits and pack-based usage. Stacked bars show the total cost split by meter type.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT 
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    CASE 
      WHEN selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:tier' THEN 'Tier Meter (Free Sponsorship)'
      ELSE 'Pack Meter (Paid Usage)'
    END as meter_type,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND is_billed_usage = true
    AND user_github_username != 'undefined'
    AND user_github_username != ''
    AND selected_meter_slug != ''
    AND response_status >= 200 
    AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT 
  ts,
  meter_type,
  SUM(total_cost) as cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY ts, meter_type
ORDER BY ts ASC, meter_type ASC

panels.title: Daily Cost by Meter Type

panels.description: Sum of total costs for unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by GitHub username and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate cost aggregation - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    user_github_username AS user,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
    AND selected_meter_slug = 'v1:meter:pack' 
)
SELECT
  ts,
  user,
  sum(total_cost) AS total_cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY
  ts, user
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, user;

panels.title: Pack Spending per Github Username

panels.description: Sum of total costs for unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by GitHub username and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate cost aggregation - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (

panels.title: Seed Tier Costs per Github Username

panels.description: Comparison of unique billed requests (successful) vs unique requests refused due to insufficient pollen balance. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate counts - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_billed AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    'Billed' AS request_type,
    request_id,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
),
deduplicated_insufficient AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    'Insufficient Funds' AS request_type,
    request_id,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND error_message = 'Insufficient pollen balance to use this model'
)
SELECT ts, request_type, count(*) AS requests
FROM (
  SELECT ts, request_type FROM deduplicated_billed WHERE rn = 1
  UNION ALL
  SELECT ts, request_type FROM deduplicated_insufficient WHERE rn = 1
)
GROUP BY ts, request_type
ORDER BY ts ASC, request_type ASC;

panels.title: Billed vs Insufficient Funds Requests

panels.description: Sum of total costs for unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by GitHub username and time granularity. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure accurate cost aggregation - one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:

    AND response_status >= 200

  user,

ORDER BY

panels.title: Nectar Tier Costs per Github Username

panels.description: Count of unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by provider and model. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    model_provider_used,
    model_used,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT
  ts,
  concat(model_provider_used, ' - ', model_used) AS provider_model,
  sum(total_cost) AS cost
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY
  ts, model_provider_used, model_used
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, model_provider_used, model_used;

panels.title: Cost per Provider per Model

panels.description: Count of unique generation requests (response_status 200-299) grouped by provider and model. Deduplicates by request_id to ensure one request = one request_id.

targets.rawSql:
WITH deduplicated_events AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('$granularity', start_time) AS ts,
    model_provider_used,
    request_id,
    total_cost,
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY request_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn
  FROM generation_event
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(start_time)
    AND response_status >= 200 AND response_status < 300
)
SELECT
  ts,
  model_provider_used AS provider,
  sum(total_cost) AS total_cost_usd
FROM deduplicated_events
WHERE rn = 1
GROUP BY
  ts, model_provider_used
ORDER BY
  ts ASC, model_provider_used;
